problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point E is the midpoint of BC, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC, EF ∥ AD, if AB = N_0, AC = N_1, then the length of FC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,设点N是AC的中点,连接EN,则EN∥AB,EN=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴∠CNE=∠BAC．∵EF∥AD,∴∠DAC=∠EFN．∵AD是∠BAC的平分线,∠CNE=∠EFN+∠FEN,∴∠EFN=∠FEN．∴FN=EN=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴FC=FN+NC=\frac{1}{2}AB+\frac{1}{2}AC=9．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了三角形中位线定理,平行线的性质,等腰三角形的判定,角平分线的定义,难度适中．通过构造△ABC的中位线,结合平行线的性质和等腰三角形的判定得出FN=EN=\frac{1}{2}AB,是解题的关键．
